name: Beat the Blitz
description: Join Peyton Manning in Gatorade’s Beat the Blitz, a free-to-play VR experience. You’ll test your throwing skills on the field, travel inside the body to see how hydration impacts performance and more. See you on the field.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer Processor: CPU Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics Card NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater Storage: 1453 MB available space Additional Notes: Video Output Compatible HDMI 1.3 video output. USB Port 3x USB 3.0 ports, plus 1x USB 2.0 port
